MKHYEN RAB MI GNYIS PA, DPAL LDAN BLO GROS BRTAN PA'I BKA' DRIN
LAS BDE BAR GSHEGS PA'I GSUNG RAB DANG THA SNYAD KYI GTZUG LAG
RNAMS LA BLO GROS RGYA CHER THOB PA GANGS CAN GYI KHROD DU SKAD
GNYIS SMRA BA SH'AKYA'I DGE SLONG BYANG CHUB RTZE MOS DAGS PO
RDZAM YUL DU BSGYUR BA RDZOGS SO,,
